title: European-based Elin Energy builds new solar panel factory in Texas - BIC Magazine
summary: Elin Energy is constructing a new solar panel factory in Waller County, Texas, which will create 100 jobs and contribute to the local economy. The factory will use advanced technology to produce high-quality solar panels efficiently, promoting renewable energy and sustainability.
green_innovation: TRUE, the factory uses advanced technology to produce high-quality and efficient solar panels, which contribute to environmental sustainability.
business_innovation: TRUE, the factory uses advanced automated production lines, precision engineering, and meticulous quality control to produce solar panels, which represents a new or improved business process.
green_product: TRUE, the solar panels produced at the factory are designed to maximize energy efficiency and reduce the carbon footprint, contributing to a cleaner and more sustainable environment.
green_process: TRUE, the factory uses advanced technology and processes to minimize environmental impacts and promote sustainability, such as using renewable energy sources and implementing waste reduction measures.
likely_naics_codes: ['335999 - All Other Miscellaneous Electrical Equipment and Component Manufacturing', '334413 - Semiconductor and Related Device Manufacturing', '334516 - Photovoltaic Cell Manufacturing', '221330 - Solar Thermal Equipment Manufacturing']
greenwashing: FALSE, the article does not provide any evidence to suggest that the described product or process innovation is an example of greenwashing.

title: Malaysia Data Center Market Report 2023: A $2.9 Billion Market by 2028 -Competition, Forecast & Opportunities ... - GlobeNewswire
summary: The Malaysia data center market is experiencing substantial growth due to the surging demand for efficient data storage and processing, driven by increasing data consumption. This growth is being fueled by the rapid adoption of cloud computing, increasing number of internet users and digital services, growth in renewable energy and infrastructure, and substantial investments by enterprises.
